name: Response Transformers
description: Tests response transformer functionality including response map modification, status changes, content transformation, and error handling in response context.

name: Channel Routing
description: Tests VMRouter and inter-channel communication including routeMessage calls, channel chaining, destination routing filters, and DestinationSet usage.

name: Multi-Destination Flow
description: Tests channels with multiple destinations including parallel processing, destination filtering by metadata, response aggregation, and failure isolation.

name: Error Handling Patterns
description: Tests error handling scenarios including source filter rejection, transformer errors, destination connection failures, and queue behavior on error.

name: Preprocessor and Postprocessor
description: Tests deploy scripts including preprocessor message modification, postprocessor logging/cleanup, and deploy/undeploy script execution.

name: Database Interactions
description: Tests database operations from user scripts including DatabaseConnection usage, query result handling, transaction support, and connection pooling.
